description:
Tamama`s invasion plan is to turn everything in the world into sweets.  But then it puts Momocchi in danger!  Then the Nishizawa Group actually goes bankrupt, leaving Momoka to stay with Fuyuki for awhile.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tamama, Kingdom of Sweets / Momoka, I Appreciate Your Kindness
タママ お菓子の王国 / 桃華 お世話になります
